title: The Adventure of the Speckled Band
body: A young woman seeks Holmes's help after her twin sister dies under mysterious circumstances. Holmes investigates a locked room mystery involving a deadly snake, revealing a stepfather's sinister plot.

title: A Scandal in Bohemia
body: The King of Bohemia hires Holmes to recover a compromising photograph. Holmes outwits the clever Irene Adler, the only woman who ever bested the detective.

title: The Red-Headed League
body: A mysterious organization recruits only red-haired men for a peculiar job. Holmes uncovers an elaborate bank robbery scheme hidden beneath this strange arrangement.

title: The Blue Carbuncle
body: A stolen diamond hidden in a goose leads Holmes to solve a theft case. The detective demonstrates his deductive prowess by tracing the gem through unexpected clues.

title: The Final Problem
body: Holmes faces his greatest nemesis, Professor Moriarty, in a battle of intellects. Their confrontation at Reichenbach Falls changes everything, leaving Watson devastated.

title: The Hound of the Baskervilles
body: A family curse of a supernatural hound terrorizes a noble family on the moors. Holmes investigates whether the legend is real or a cover for a more sinister plot.

title: The Adventure of the Dancing Men
body: Cryptic stick-figure drawings plague a country gentleman's family. Holmes deciphers the coded messages and stops a criminal from his past seeking revenge.

title: The Adventure of the Twisted Lip
body: A respectable gentleman is found in a disreputable opium den under mysterious circumstances. Holmes uncovers a clever disguise and financial fraud scheme.

title: The Adventure of the Six Napoleons
body: Six plaster busts of Napoleon are systematically destroyed. Holmes traces the theft to a hidden treasure, revealing why someone is willing to go to great lengths.

title: The Beryl Coronet
body: A stolen coronet threatens a family's honor and a young man's innocence. Holmes uses his keen observation to prove the true culprit and restore justice.
